definition: to play ball/to play with a ball
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from

sentences.english: The play ball for 1 hour every day.
sentences.chinese: 他們打球打了一個鐘頭每天。

sentences.english: Many top players from around the world earn big money playing in America’s NBA.
sentences.chinese: 很多頂尖的運動員通過在美國NBA中打球掙大錢。

sentences.english: I had an early dinner to play tennis afterward.
sentences.chinese: 晚上爲了打球，早早的吃了飯就趕去球場。

sentences.english: PHILADELPHIA (AP) -- Unwanted by the NBA, Allen Iverson is considering playing in China.
sentences.chinese: NBA無人感冒的艾弗森正考慮來中國打球。

sentences.english: You know, there's like different rankings of leagues you can play in.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在不同等級的聯隊裏打球。

sentences.english: Let'sgo to the golf course this afternoon and tee off at 2o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 我們今天下午兩點去高爾夫球場打球吧。

sentences.english: Today we bought a ping pong table so we can all practice daily at home.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們買了乒乓桌，每天可在家裏練習打球。

sentences.english: In case of lightning, please stop play and take shelter immediately.
sentences.chinese: 如遇打雷閃電，請立即停止打球，到安全區暫避。

sentences.english: As we know, Wang Zhizhi is the first player in Asia to join the NBA.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，王治郅是到NBA打球的亞洲第一人。

sentences.english: Waugh 's Australian team developed a new style of play.
sentences.chinese: 沃的澳大利亞球隊開發出一種新的打球方法。

sentences.english: However, seeing is believing, and we've yet to get a glimpse.
sentences.chinese: 然而，眼見爲實，我們至今還沒有看過他們一起打球。

sentences.english: The noise suddenly stopped and the sportsground became very quiet.
sentences.chinese: 突然，打球聲停了，運動場上變得靜悄悄的。

sentences.english: But playing against an outmanned opponent, it didn't matter.
sentences.chinese: 但是和人手不足的對手打球這沒有關係。

sentences.english: LAUNCH: I understand you still play hoops in Venice Beach?
sentences.chinese: 我瞭解到，你還在威尼斯的海灘上打球？

sentences.english: Pargo played in Russia and Greece last season.
sentences.chinese: 他上賽季在俄羅斯和希臘打球。

sentences.english: "We want to play basketball," NBA commissioner David Stern said.
sentences.chinese: “我們想要去打球，”NBA總裁大衛斯特恩說。

definition: Kobe Bryant/abbr. for 科比·布萊恩特|科比·布莱恩特[Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4]
to watch a football game (or other ball game)/Fore! (golf)/Watch out for the ball!
football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
Yao Ming (1980-), retired Chinese basketball player, played for CBA Shanghai Sharks 1997-2002 and for NBA Houston Rockets 2002-2011
(ball game) enthusiast (player)/golf buddy (or tennis buddy etc)
Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
